#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define si(a) scanf("%d", &a)
#define sl(a) scanf("%lld", &a)
#define sc(a) scanf("%c", &a)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define SET(x, a) memset(x, a, sizeof(x))
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
	ll n, s, m, q, k;
	vector <pair<ll, ll> > v;
	sl(n);
	for (ll i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
		sl(s);sl(m);
		v.pb(mp(-1 * s * m, i));
	}
	sort(v.begin(), v.end());
//	reverse(v.begin(), v.end());
 
	sl(q);
	while (q--) {
		sl(k);
		k--;
		printf("%lld\n", v[k].second);
	}
	return 0;
}
